title: The Prize
occurrences: Ladies and Gentlemen: this year's winners of the Nobel Prize.
The literature prize went to the American novelist Andrew Craig.
The youngest man to be thus honoured since Kipling won the prize at the age of 42.
The prize awarded to Dr. Garret that he shares with Dr. Farelli of Rome
in Chemistry the prize went to the French husband and wife team of Dr. Claude Marceau and Dr Denise Marceau.
They achieved the prize for their researches into sperm structure and human reproductive cells.
Dr. Stratman has been awarded his prize for his research in solar energy.
Dr. John Garret and Dr. Carlo Farelli were jointly awarded the Nobel Prize in Medicine.
